column1: I love this product and was ecstatic to find I could get it through Wal-Mart online and at a cheaper price. It was a little longer to arrive than what I would have preferred for standard shipping, but it did arrive as promised and I we ould definitely order it again.
Love this stuff ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Light weight and quickly absorbed into the skin. I highly recommend this moisturizer!
